title: Packages from home
creator_credit: Dave Piggott, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When Dave Piggott went to fight in the Vietnam War at 19, it was a very different world to life back in Australia. With the help of the friends he made in the army, he soon got used to life there and it’s the funny stories and good friends that remain with him today.
